title: Spicy Tomato Cooler
directions: Stir tomato-vegetable juice cocktail, beef broth, steak sauce, lime juice, hot pepper sauce, horseradish, and celery salt together in a pitcher.
Fill 2 cocktail glasses with crushed ice. Pour cooler over ice; garnish with celery stalks and lime slices.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) can tomato-vegetable juice cocktail (such as V8)
1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHot)
1 teaspoon prepared horseradish, or to taste
